alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Iron; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:30PM CDT until July 03 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BAYFIELD...WEST CENTRAL IRON...ASHLAND AND NORTHERN SAWYER COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gurney, to 6 miles east of Clam Lake, to 10 miles south of Namekagon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Glidden around 550 PM CDT. Upson around 555 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lost Land Lake, Teal Lake, Island Lake Iron County, Morse, Ghost Lake, High Bridge, Iron Belt, Spider Lake, Moose Lake Sawyer County and Copper Falls State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
